channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: i got my compiler and things working but it wont save my char and also i need to know how to make me a admin i use cheezscape source please help :)

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

in client.java search for
// Start Mod/Admin/Owner List / 1 = Mod / 2 = Admin / 3 = Admin/Owner
under it add
if (playerName =="Your Name") {
playerRights == 3;
}

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

the first admin you find is not correct do it till you find a // (with admin in that line)

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

to make your self an admin you :
Find “admin”

then change “admin” to your username and the playerrights are underneith they are:

&& playerRights >= 0 is Normal Player (no rights) and && playerRights >= 1 is Player Mod (Silver Crown beside name)

&& playerRights >= 2 is a Admin (Every right possible)

Try it out[br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2007, 09:55:44 PM[/size][hr]all that in Client.java

Read full topic
